name: Grifols, S.A.
goal: Grifols is a global healthcare company with a mission to improve the health and well-being of patients around the world.
interests: Business and Industry, Public Health, Research and innovation, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Grifols participates in policy discussions with a broad network of EU stakeholders with the goal of improving patient access to care. Grifols is interested in EU blood, tissues, and cell legislation and related policies.
